div.h3: Students will realize their dreams by developing communication skills, reasoning, integrity, and motivation through academic excellence, a well rounded education, and being active citizens of our diverse community.

div.class: dashboard-1 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: Our Board sets a direction for the district, establishes policies, ensures accountability and provides community leadership on behalf of the district.

div.class: dashboard-2 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: The Local Control Accountability Plan (LCAP) shows how state funds will Improve student outcomes and performance for all students .

div.class: dashboard-3 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: The Student Services Department offers a wide variety of information and support to students, staff, and families.
